name: Pogoman
description:
Pogoman is a 3D adrenaline-fueled, physics-based platformer that offers high difficulty and interesting game mechanics.

Main game features:

  • 35 carefully designed levels with different themes.
  • Unique game mechanics in each level.
  • Over 50 gadgets to customize your character.
  • Control with a mouse (or analog stick for gamepad) with an emphasis on balancing.
  • Gamepad support (DS4/DualSense and Xbox One controller).
  • Highly challenging platformer with a focus on precision and occasional speed.
  • Completing levels and collecting stars to unlock gadgets.
  • Ability to customize the appearance of the character and the colors of the pogo stick.
  • Leaderboards to compare best times with friends.

Pogoman is designed for gamers who enjoy challenging physics-based platformers and precise gameplay. Get ready for the challenges that await you in each level and try to achieve the best completion times.
